indicators_point: Patient reports intense itching described as 'ants under skin'
Dull heavy feeling under right ribs
Patient reports wife noticed yellow eyes
Dull heavy feeling under right ribs
History of dental abscess treated with Augmentin

checklist.answer: Yeah, just that lisinopril for my blood pressure. I was takin' some Tylenol for a toothache, but I stopped that yesterday.
Nah, no allergies to meds that I know of.

checklist.text: Have you traveled recently or been exposed to anyone with similar symptoms?
checklist.answer: Nah, been stayin' close to home. And nope, no one else is sick around me. Just me.

checklist.text: Have you had any changes in your urine or stool color?
checklist.answer: Yeah, the urine's dark, like Coke. And the stool this mornin' was like... pale. Like clay.

checklist.text: Can you describe the itching more? Is it worse at certain times of day or on certain parts of your body?
checklist.answer: It's just... everywhere. All the time. Sometimes it's on my arms, other times my chest. It was really bad last night, made it hard to sleep. Feels like my skin is raw underneath.

checklist.text: Have you experienced any abdominal pain, especially in the upper right side?
checklist.answer: Yeah, kinda. It's not really sharp or anything, just a dull heavy feelin' under my ribs down there on the right side. Been there a little while.

checklist.text: Can you describe the intensity of the itching on a scale of 1 to 10?
checklist.answer: It's bad. Like, a good eight or nine most of the time. Sometimes worse if I think about it. Makes it hard to focus or even sleep.

checklist.text: Have you experienced any nausea, vomiting, or loss of appetite?
checklist.answer: Yeah, I haven't been feelin' real hungry lately. Had a little nausea now and then, but haven't thrown up.

checklist.text: Have you had any fevers or chills?
checklist.answer: Nah, don't think so. No fevers I noticed.

checklist.text: Can you describe the pain in your right side more? Is it constant or does it come and go?
checklist.answer: Well, my tooth was really killin' me. I was takin' like, six to eight pills a day, for about the last three weeks. Just tryin' to deal with the pain.

checklist.text: Have you experienced any unintentional weight loss recently?
checklist.answer: Nah, haven't really weighed myself, but my clothes feel a little loose. Must be from not eatin' as much with the nausea.

checklist.text: Have you had any recent travel or exposure to anyone with similar symptoms?
checklist.answer: Nope, haven't traveled, and no one else seems to be havin' these problems.

checklist.text: Have you had any fevers or chills, especially with the itching or abdominal discomfort?
checklist.answer: Nah, don't think so. Haven't felt feverish or had any chills. Just this itch and the yellow.

checklist.text: Have you noticed any changes in your bowel habits besides the color, such as diarrhea or constipation?
checklist.answer: Nah, just the color of the stool. No real diarrhea or gettin' stopped up.

checklist.text: Have you consumed alcohol recently, and if so, how much?
checklist.answer: I have a few beers with the guys, nothin' crazy.

conversation.text: Hello, I'm Nurse Sarah. I see we have some initial information about you, but I'll need to ask a few more questions to get a clearer picture of your condition. What brings you in today?
My sister said I was turnin' yellow. My eyes look like piss. And this damn itching. It feels like ants are crawl-in' under my skin. Can you give me something for that itch? It's drivin' me nuts.

highlights.text: ants are crawl-in' under my skin

conversation.text: That sounds very uncomfortable, I'm sorry you're experiencing that. Have you noticed any changes in your urine or stool color?
Yeah, the urine's dark, like Coke. And the stool this mornin' was like... pale. Like clay.

highlights.text: stool this mornin' was like... pale

conversation.text: Thank you for telling me that. Can you describe the itching more? Is it worse at certain times of day, or on certain parts of your body?
It's just... everywhere. All the time. Sometimes it's on my arms, other times my chest. It was really bad last night, made it hard to sleep. Feels like my skin is raw underneath.

That does sound very intense. Do you have any drug allergies?

conversation.text: Thank you. Based on what you've told me, we need to do some further tests to better understand your condition. The doctor will be seeing you shortly.
Alright. Can you at least give me somethin' for this itch though? It's drivin' me crazy.

recommendations: Urgent hepatology consultation for suspected acute liver injury
Comprehensive liver panel (AST, ALT, ALP, GGT, Bilirubin)
Abdominal ultrasound with Doppler to evaluate biliary tree
Review acetaminophen toxicity risk given high-dose Tylenol use
Consider N-acetylcysteine if acetaminophen toxicity suspected
Antihistamines or cholestyramine for pruritus management
